Class iTweenHashBuilder

iTween hash builder.
All params:
name|audiosource|volume|pitch|time|delay|easetype|
looptype|onstart|onstarttarget|onstartparams|onupdate|
onupdatetarget|onupdateparams|oncomplete|
oncompletetarget|oncompleteparams|ignoretimescale|
amount|color|r|g|b|a|NamedColorValue|includechildren|
alpha|looktarget|axis|speed|x|y|z|looktime|space|position|
path|movetopath|orienttopath|lookahead|islocal|
rotation|scale|audioclip|from|to

Info:

  • Copyright: 2017
  • Author: Albert Feng (SES XueLan)

Properties



Functions

public Hashtable SetName (string name) Sets the iTween name.
an individual name useful for stopping iTweens by name
public Hashtable SetAudioSource (AudioSource audioSource) Sets the audio source.
for which AudioSource to use
public Hashtable SetVolume (float volume) Sets the volume.
for the target level of volume

for the time in seconds the animation will wait before beginning

for the time in seconds the animation will wait before beginning
public Hashtable SetEaseType (iTween.EaseType easeType) Sets the type of the ease.
for the shape of the easing curve applied to the animation
public Hashtable SetLoopType (iTween.LoopType looptype) Sets the type of the loop.
for the type of loop to apply once the animation has completed

a function to launch at the beginning of the animation

for a reference to the GameObject that holds the "onstart" method

for arguments to be sent to the "onstart" method

a function to launch on every step of the animation

a function to launch on every step of the animation

a function to launch on every step of the animation

for a reference to the GameObject that holds the "onupdate" method

for arguments to be sent to the "onupdate" method

a function to launch at the end of the animation

a function to launch at the end of the animation

for a reference to the GameObject that holds the "oncomplete" method
public Hashtable SetOnCompleteParams (object param) Sets the on complete parameters.
for arguments to be sent to the "oncomplete" method
public Hashtable SetIgnoreTimeScale (bool b) Sets the ignore time scale.
setting this to true will allow the animation to continue independent of the current time which is helpful for animating menus after a game has been paused by setting Time.timeScale=0
public Hashtable SetAmount (float amount) Sets the amount.
[CameraFadeFrom|CameraFadeTo]for how transparent the Texture2D that the camera fade uses is
public Hashtable SetAmount (double amount) Sets the amount.
[CameraFadeFrom|CameraFadeTo]for how transparent the Texture2D that the camera fade uses is
public Hashtable SetColor (Color color) Sets the color.
the color to fade the object to

for the individual setting of the color red

for the individual setting of the color red

for the individual setting of the color green

for the individual setting of the alpha
public Hashtable SetNamedColorValue (iTween.NamedValueColor namedValueColor) Sets the named color value.
for which color of a shader to use. Uses "_Color" by default.
public Hashtable SetIncludeChildren (bool b) Sets the include children.
for whether or not to include children of this GameObject. True by default
public Hashtable SetAlpha (float alpha) Sets the alpha.
for the initial alpha value of the animation.
public Hashtable SetLooktarget (Transform transform) Sets the looktarget.
for a target the GameObject will look at.
public Hashtable SetLooktarget (Vector3 vector3) Sets the looktarget.
for a target the GameObject will look at.
public Hashtable SetAxis (Axis axis) Sets the axis.
Restricts rotation to the supplied axis only.
public Hashtable SetSpeed (float speed) Sets the speed.
can be used instead of time to allow animation based on speed
public Hashtable SetSpeed (double speed) Sets the speed.
can be used instead of time to allow animation based on speed
public Hashtable SetAmount (Vector3 amount) Sets the amount.
[MoveAdd]for a point in space the GameObject will animate to.
public Hashtable SetX (float x) Sets the x.
for the individual setting of the x axis
public Hashtable SetX (double x) Sets the x.
for the individual setting of the x axis
public Hashtable SetY (float y) Sets the y.
for the individual setting of the y axis

public Hashtable SetZ (double z) Sets the z.
for the individual setting of the z axis
public Hashtable SetLookTime (float lookTime) Sets the look time.
for the time in seconds the object will take to look at either the "looktarget" or "orienttopath"
public Hashtable SetSpace (Space space) Sets the space.
for applying the transformation in either the world coordinate or local cordinate system. Defaults to local space
public Hashtable SetPosition (Transform transform) Sets the position.
for a point in space the GameObject will animate to.
public Hashtable SetPosition (Vector3 vector3) Sets the position.
for a point in space the GameObject will animate to.
public Hashtable SetPath (Vector3[] vector3Array) Sets the path.
for a list of points to draw a Catmull-Rom through for a curved animation path
public Hashtable SetPath (Transform[] transformArray) Sets the path.
for a list of points to draw a Catmull-Rom through for a curved animation path
public Hashtable SetMoveToPath (bool isMoveToPath) Sets the move to path.
for whether to automatically generate a curve from the GameObject's current position to the beginning of the path. True by default.
public Hashtable SetOrientToPath (bool isOrientToPath) Sets the orient to path.
for whether or not the GameObject will orient to its direction of travel. False by default
public Hashtable SetLookAhead (float lookAhead) Sets the look ahead.
for how much of a percentage (from 0 to 1) to look ahead on a path to influence how strict "orienttopath" is and how much the object will anticipate each curve
public Hashtable SetLookAhead (double lookAhead) Sets the look ahead.
for how much of a percentage (from 0 to 1) to look ahead on a path to influence how strict "orienttopath" is and how much the object will anticipate each curve
public Hashtable SetIsLocal (bool isLocal) Sets the is local.
for whether to animate in world space or relative to the parent. False be default.
public Hashtable SetRotation (Transform transform) Sets the rotation.
for the target Euler angles in degrees to rotate to.
public Hashtable SetRotation (Vector3 vector3) Sets the rotation.
for the target Euler angles in degrees to rotate to.
public Hashtable SetScale (Transform transform) Sets the scale.
for the initial scale
public Hashtable SetScale (Vector3 vector3) Sets the scale.
for the initial scale
public Hashtable SetAudioclip (AudioClip audioClip) Sets the audioclip.
for a reference to the AudioClip to be played.
public Hashtable SetFrom (float from) Sets from.
[ValueTo ]for the starting value.

[ValueTo ]for the starting value.
